span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 改变外观： to alter the outward appearance of; transform
【例】 transfigure the AutoCAD drawings with elegant symbols 用优美的符号使 AutoCAD图变得美观
【近】 alchemize, metamorphose, transform, transmute, transpose, transubstantiate, make over

【记】 trans 转变 + figure 外形
